joining.note: Joining fee charged after 120 days of card issuance. Amount is ₹2,500 + applicable GST

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹4 Lakh in an anniversary year (12 billing cycles) to get Renewal Fee waived for next year

addOnCard.note: Lifetime free add-on cards. Add-on members can also apply for Priority Pass

latePayment.note: Late payment charges are exclusive of GST

rentTransaction.note: 1% fee on rental transactions via CRED, PayTM, Cheq, MobiKwik, Freecharge etc. Capped at ₹4,999 per transaction. Effective July 2025

fuelTransaction.note: 1% fee on fuel spends exceeding ₹30,000 per transaction. Capped at ₹4,999 per transaction

utilityTransaction.note: 1% fee on utility spends exceeding ₹75,000 per calendar month

educationTransaction.note: 1% fee on education transactions via third-party apps like CRED, Nobroker, Cheq. Direct payments to institutions not charged

railwayTicket.note: 1% of transaction amount + GST for railway ticket purchases

selfEmployed.note: Annual ITR must be more than Rs.12 lakh

existingRelationship.note: Can apply using ITR, GST returns, Bank Statements, and Merchant payment reports

documentsRequired: Business Proof (GST registration certificate, business license, or incorporation certificate)
Financial Proof (Latest ITR, audited financial statements, bank statements, or merchant payment reports)

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, ITR, GST returns, and business profile
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history and increased business turnover

purchaseAPR.note: 3.75% per month (45% per annum) for all variants except premium cards

revolvingCredit.note: 3.60% monthly interest rate on revolving balance as per FAQ

gracePeriod.note: Interest free credit period ranges from 25 to 55 days

minPayment.calculation: 5% of (Finance Charge + Retail Spends + Cash Advance) or 100% Finance Charges + 5% Retail Spends, plus GST and EMI amounts

cashAdvance.note: 2.5% or ₹500, whichever is higher. Cash withdrawal limit is 40% of credit limit

baseRate.note: Earn 4 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent. Effective reward rate ~1.73% at best redemption value

rewards.earningText: Earn 4 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent on business expenses

exclusions.note: No rewards on petrol, wallet, rent, education, EMI transactions

statementCycle.note: Maximum 60,000 Reward Points can be earned in a statement cycle. Maximum 5,000 accelerated reward points per statement cycle

welcome.description: Get Amazon Prime Annual Membership + BizPrime 6 months subscription on completing 1 online transaction within first 30 days of card issuance

business.note: 4 Reward Points per ₹150 on all business spends except excluded categories

fuel.note: No rewards on fuel transactions. Fuel surcharge waiver not applicable

rent.note: No rewards on rent payments. 1% transaction fee also applicable

walletLoads.note: No rewards on wallet loads. 1% fee on wallet loading >₹10,000/month from July 2025

education.note: No rewards on education payments for business cards

insurance.note: Capped at 2000 points per month (effective July 2025)

onlineGaming.note: No rewards on online skill-based gaming spends (effective July 2025)

businessSpends.name: 5X Business Accelerator
eligibleCategories: Utility and Bill Payments via SmartPay & PayZapp
Vendor/Supplier payments via Swifti and SmartHub Vyapar
Hotel and Flight bookings via MMT MyBiz (SmartBuy BizDeals)
Business Software purchases (Tally Prime, AWS, Google Workspace, Microsoft Azure, Office 365) via SmartBuy BizDeals - Nuclei
businessSpends.note: Earn 5X Reward Points (20 RP per ₹150) on spending more than ₹25,000 per statement cycle on select business categories. Capped at 5,000 RP per statement cycle

smartBuy.name: SmartBuy
smartBuy.note: Get up to 10X Reward Points on Apple, Flipkart, and MakeMyTrip through SmartBuy

mmtMyBiz.note: 4% discount on flight and hotel bookings. Discounted fares, free meals, seat selection, low cancellation fees

nuclei.note: Instant discounts on business software. Get GST invoice to claim Input Tax Credit

redemption.bestOption: Business Catalogue via NetBanking & SmartBuy at ₹0.65 per point

pointsPlusPay.note: For flights and hotels, redeem up to 50% of booking value through Reward Points. For vouchers/products, up to 70%

options.note: Best value redemption at ₹0.65 per RP
Redeem up to 50% of booking value through Reward Points
Up to ₹0.35 per RP. Can redeem up to 70% of product value through points
Up to 70% of voucher value can be paid through points
Lowest value redemption at ₹0.20 per RP. Minimum 500 points required

transferPartners.note: BizPower does not have dedicated transfer partners like premium cards. Airmiles conversion available via NetBanking

rewards.specialLogic: 5X acceleration requires minimum ₹25,000 spend in statement cycle on eligible business categories

calculator.formula: basePoints = floor(spend / 150) * 4; acceleratedPoints = (spend >= 25000 && isEligibleCategory) ? min(floor(eligibleSpend / 150) * 16, 5000) : 0; totalPoints = basePoints + acceleratedPoints

spendRequired.note: 2 complimentary domestic lounge access every calendar quarter. Additional 2 complimentary access on spending ₹75,000 in previous quarter (excluding first quarter of card issuance)

domestic.note: Primary and add-on cardholders share the 16 visits quota per year

international.prerequisite: Complete minimum 4 retail transactions on BizPower Credit Card to apply for Priority Pass

guestFee.note: $27 (INR equivalent) + taxes per person per visit

excessVisitCharge.note: $27 (INR equivalent) + taxes per visit beyond complimentary limit

milestones.benefit: ₹2,500 voucher from MakeMyTrip or Reliance Digital
milestones.conditions: Choose from MakeMyTrip or Reliance Digital. Excludes rent, petrol, wallet transactions. Posted within 90 days. Maximum 4 vouchers per year (₹10,000 value)

programs.name: Swiggy Dineout
programs.note: Pay with BizPower Card and enjoy 10% extra off on dining bills at 35K+ restaurants

fuel.note: Fuel surcharge waiver NOT applicable for BizPower. No reward points on fuel transactions

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency
dynamicCurrencyConversion.note: 1% markup fee on DCC transactions at international locations

forex.note: Foreign currency markup is 3.5% of transaction value

concierge.note: Standard customer service available via 1800 202 6161 / 1860 267 6161. Overseas: 022-6160660

noCostEMI.note: Available on select merchants and products

conversionFee.note: EMI processing fee of up to ₹299 for EasyEMI at merchants

emi.note: Convert big spends into EMI after purchase using SmartEMI. Reward points reversed on EMI conversion. ₹500 + GST late fee for Insta Jumbo loan non-payment

processingFee.note: 1% of BT amount or ₹250, whichever is higher + applicable taxes

balanceTransfer.note: Transfer balances from other bank cards

memberships.name: Amazon Prime
memberships.condition: Complete 1 online transaction within 30 days of card issuance
memberships.note: Welcome benefit - complimentary Amazon Prime annual membership

memberships.name: BizPrime
memberships.condition: Complete 1 online transaction within 30 days of card issuance
memberships.note: Welcome benefit - business services membership from BigCity Promotions for SMEs. Includes accounting & finance, travel & utilities, HR & Payroll, Logistics services

benefits.note: Automate utility bill payments. Get assured CashBack up to ₹1800 in first year and e-vouchers worth up to ₹800 for adding 2+ bills on Smart Pay

jumboLoan.note: Processing fee up to ₹1,299 + GST. ₹500 + GST late fee for non-payment

creditLiability.note: Credit liability cover of Rs. 9 lakh

zeroLiability.condition: Report lost card immediately to 24-hour call centre
zeroLiability.note: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions after card is reported lost

fireAndBurglary.note: Fire & Burglary insurance for Shop up to Rs. 5 lakh

businessInsurance.note: Optional business insurance package available at annual premium of Rs. 3,785. Cardholders can choose higher cover as per business need

insurance.note: Standard business card with credit liability cover and optional business insurance. Travel insurance covers not included

contactless.note: Contactless payments for transactions up to ₹5,000 without PIN

upiLinking.note: Credit card purchases via UPI earn reward points up to 500 points per calendar month

cardControls.platform: MyCards / EVA / WhatsApp Banking / Net Banking

autopay.note: Standing Instruction on HDFC account for Auto Debit

upgradesTo.note: BizBlack Metal is the premium business card for high-volume businesses

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history, business profile, and ITR

meta.bestFor: Self-employed professionals and SME owners who spend significantly on business expenses like tax payments, GST, utility bills, and business software, and want rewards on these operational costs
meta.notRecommendedFor: Salaried individuals, low business spenders, or those who primarily need fuel benefits
meta.verdict: HDFC Bank BizPower Credit Card is a solid mid-tier business credit card offering excellent value for SMEs. The 5X rewards on business-critical spends like tax, GST, and software purchases make it stand out. The ₹2,500 annual fee is easily justified through accelerated rewards and lounge access. Best suited for self-employed individuals with ₹4L+ annual business spends who can maximize the 5X categories.
pros: 5X accelerated rewards on key business expenses (tax, GST, utility, software)
Good base reward rate of 1.73% (4 RP per ₹150)
16 domestic + 6 international lounge visits per year
Amazon Prime + BizPrime membership as welcome benefit
Quarterly milestone vouchers worth ₹2,500 on ₹2.5L spend
Up to 55 days interest-free credit period
Low annual fee with easy waiver condition (₹4L spend)
cons: No rewards on fuel, rent, wallet, education transactions
5X rewards cap of 5,000 points per statement cycle
Priority Pass requires 4 transactions to apply
dataSource: BizPower Credit Card Reward Points Program (August 2024)

changelog.change: Rent transaction fee changed to 1% capped at ₹4999. Wallet loading fee introduced. Online gaming transactions no longer earn rewards
New fee structure - fuel fee threshold ₹30K, utility fee threshold ₹75K/month, late payment charges updated
changelog.source: BizPower Credit Card Reward Points Program document

changelog.change: Education payments via third-party apps no longer earn rewards
Rent and government transactions no longer earn rewards. Grocery rewards capped at 2000 points/month
